messages.title: My local issues are
messages.content: Give the public a full and binding consultation, before we cover the island with wind farms. I support the Wylfa B development.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: YES to referendums on all major issues
NO to wasting £45 million a day in Brussels

mentions.candidate: Elaine Gill has lived on Anglesey for the last 30 years.

issues.brexitEurope: YES to referendums on all major issues
issues.economy: NO to wasting £45 million a day in Brussels
issues.environment: Give the public a full and binding consultation, before we cover the island with wind farms. I support the Wylfa B development.

housing.content: I support the Wylfa B development.

leaflet.personalStatement: Elaine has lived on Anglesey for the last 30 years. She is married with two children, retired NHS employee who cares greatly about the health business sector and the jobs that they employed 158 people on the island. Elaine has always prided herself in putting the people of Anglesey before party politics.

quotes.text: I support Wylfa B and believe it is time our local politicians made it easier for industry and businesses to set up shop on Anglesey
I do not think the island is good to cover it in wind farms
Plaid Cymru and Labour are suggesting - Especially those with their heads buried in the sand
Unsightly and heavily subsidised by you and me! Why are we not making use of tidal power schemes, especially in the Straits where the currents are at their predictable?

images.caption: Elaine Gill, UK Independence Party leaflet
